title: Can anyone ID this???? Thanks!!
content:
Can anybody ID this one? It is also used (i posted earlier about a different font with same use) on Edition Peters score books. It's really nice and elegant. Would love to get my hands on it for this project. Anybody?? Thanks!! Love this site!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [what is this font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526033945/http:/typophile.com/files/what%20is%20this%20font.jpg) | 263.48 KB |
author: brodyalbert

comments.content:
Tiemann Mediaeval, 1909, Gebr. Klingspor Typefoundry, Offenbach, Germany.  
Designer: Walter Tiemann (1876-1851)

Wow. Really impressed. Thanks so much!

Any idea where I can find it? I did a cursory search with no luck.
or Gerhard Helzel? which, from what I've read on this site, is a digitization Tiemann Mediaeval.
